":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/TokenNetwork.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc7393e94c134e8e5640f7bd0ba297502a6dba2e199193f16c8979384f6a11224","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a8de7d79ca056a63d7b8d9734ca1838d6bc9ede5fd415b21cf5a513be7f960d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmZw5zH3QfRDvs1dG8VMrYbUQVNi6zxvTqox3kJrZpjDXN"]},"src/TokenNetworkRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2685c30bee4901271b3d93169326b9becbdb1b603af02d1223cf87b5a9c4207d","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://912ac956b9414197a1563e9e8069570562300a8387424c956fa079f481ccf0a2","dweb:/ipfs/QmPknVxVBXL29DAuqAQkbi9T4PzDNQF7tGj2i2KiqdzFgW"]}},"version":1}

addAllowedToken(address).details: Can only be called by contract owner

params.token: The address of the token to whitelist

constructor.details: Calls Ownable constructor with msg.sender as the initial owner (OpenZeppelin v5.x requirement)

createTokenNetwork(address).details: Validates token address, checks for duplicates, verifies ERC20 compliance,      deploys TokenNetwork, and maintains bidirectional mappings.

params.token: The address of the ERC20 token for which to create a TokenNetwork

returns._0: The address of the newly deployed TokenNetwork contract Requirements: - token must not be the zero address - token must not already have a TokenNetwork - token must be a valid ERC20 contract (implements totalSupply()) - if whitelist is enabled, token must be whitelisted Emits a {TokenNetworkCreated} event upon successful creation

params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to query

returns._0: The address of the TokenNetwork contract, or address(0) if none exists

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeAllowedToken(address).details: Can only be called by contract owner. Does not affect existing TokenNetworks.

params.token: The address of the token to remove from whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setWhitelistEnabled(bool).details: Can only be called by contract owner

params.enabled: True to enable whitelist enforcement, false to disable

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addAllowedToken(address).notice: Adds a token to the whitelist

allowedTokens(address).notice: Optional token whitelist - if enabled, only whitelisted tokens can create networks

constructor.notice: Initializes the TokenNetworkRegistry with ownership control

createTokenNetwork(address).notice: Creates a new TokenNetwork contract for an ERC20 token

getTokenNetwork(address).notice: Retrieves the TokenNetwork address for a given ERC20 token

removeAllowedToken(address).notice: Removes a token from the whitelist

token_network_to_token(address).notice: Reverse mapping from TokenNetwork contract address to ERC20 token address

token_to_token_networks(address).notice: Mapping from ERC20 token address to its TokenNetwork contract address

whitelistEnabled().notice: Flag to enable/disable whitelist enforcement (false by default - all tokens allowed)
